languages.text: "Руолдо, ты творил немыслимую ересь, и я отказываюсь признавать тебя человеком и зачитывать приговор, как того заслуживают преступники. Ты — пятно на истории Тассеры, и тебя..." {n}Вы вскидываете оружие и приканчиваете губернатора одновременно с тем как Соломон завершает:{/n} "...пора стереть".

"Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."
languages.original_text: "Руолдо, ты творил немыслимую ересь, и я отказываюсь признавать тебя человеком и зачитывать приговор, как того заслуживают преступники. Ты — пятно на истории Тассеры, и тебя..." {n}Вы вскидываете оружие и приканчиваете губернатора одновременно с тем как Соломон завершает:{/n} "...пора стереть".

You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

"Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

languages.text: "Ruoldo, Ihr habt eine unglaubliche Ketzerei begangen und ich weigere mich, Euch als menschliches Wesen anzuerkennen oder Euer Urteil vorzulesen, wie es sich für einen Kriminellen geziemt. Ihr seid ein Schandfleck in Thasseras Geschichte und es wird Zeit ..." {n}Du richtest deine Waffe auf den Gouverneur und tötest ihn, sobald Solomorne das Urteil verkündet.{/n} "... Euch von dessen Antlitz zu tilgen."
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo, Ihr habt eine unglaubliche Ketzerei begangen und ich weigere mich, Euch als menschliches Wesen anzuerkennen oder Euer Urteil vorzulesen, wie es sich für einen Kriminellen geziemt. Ihr seid ein Schandfleck in Thasseras Geschichte und es wird Zeit ..." {n}Du richtest deine Waffe auf den Gouverneur und tötest ihn, sobald Solomorne das Urteil verkündet.{/n} "... Euch von dessen Antlitz zu tilgen."

languages.text: "Ruoldo, akıl almaz bir kâfirliğe bulaştın. Seni insan olarak tanımayı ya da hükmünü bir suçluya yakışır şekilde okumayı reddediyorum. Thassera tarihine bir leke olarak geçtin, o lekeyi..." {n}Silahını doğrultuyor ve Solomorne sözlerini bitiremeden valinin canını alıyorsun.{/n} "Temizleme vakti geldi."
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo, akıl almaz bir kâfirliğe bulaştın. Seni insan olarak tanımayı ya da hükmünü bir suçluya yakışır şekilde okumayı reddediyorum. Thassera tarihine bir leke olarak geçtin, o lekeyi..." {n}Silahını doğrultuyor ve Solomorne sözlerini bitiremeden valinin canını alıyorsun.{/n} "Temizleme vakti geldi."

languages.text: « Ruoldo, vous vous êtes livré à une hérésie dépassant l'entendement. Je refuse de vous reconnaître en tant qu'être humain ou de vous lire votre verdict comme à tout criminel. Vous souillez l'histoire de Thassera, et il est plus que temps... {n}vous pointez votre arme sur le gouverneur et l'achevez avant que Solomorne ne termine sa phrase :{/n} de vous effacer de ses annales. »
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

traits.locale_text: « Ruoldo, vous vous êtes livré à une hérésie dépassant l'entendement. Je refuse de vous reconnaître en tant qu'être humain ou de vous lire votre verdict comme à tout criminel. Vous souillez l'histoire de Thassera, et il est plus que temps... {n}vous pointez votre arme sur le gouverneur et l'achevez avant que Solomorne ne termine sa phrase :{/n} de vous effacer de ses annales. »

languages.text: «Ruoldo, ha perpetrado una herejía impensable, y me niego a reconocerlo como un ser humano o dictar sentencia como correspondería a un criminal. Es usted una mancha en la historia de Thassera, y ha llegado el momento...». {n}Levantas tu arma y das muerte al gobernador mientras Solomorne concluye la sentencia:{/n} «... de limpiarla».
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

traits.locale_text: «Ruoldo, ha perpetrado una herejía impensable, y me niego a reconocerlo como un ser humano o dictar sentencia como correspondería a un criminal. Es usted una mancha en la historia de Thassera, y ha llegado el momento...». {n}Levantas tu arma y das muerte al gobernador mientras Solomorne concluye la sentencia:{/n} «... de limpiarla».

languages.text: “罗尔多，你犯下了不可饶恕的异端恶行。我拒绝承认你是人类成员，也拒绝以‘罪犯’这个词来称呼你。你是塔瑟拉历史上的污点。如今，是时候将你这个污点——”{n}你举起了手中的武器，干净利落地处决了总督，而索罗蒙也在这一刻结束了宣判。{/n}“——彻底抹除。”
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

traits.locale_text: “罗尔多，你犯下了不可饶恕的异端恶行。我拒绝承认你是人类成员，也拒绝以‘罪犯’这个词来称呼你。你是塔瑟拉历史上的污点。如今，是时候将你这个污点——”{n}你举起了手中的武器，干净利落地处决了总督，而索罗蒙也在这一刻结束了宣判。{/n}“——彻底抹除。”

languages.text: 「ルオルド、お前は思いもよらぬ異端を犯した。俺はお前を人間とも、犯罪者として裁かれるべき存在とも認めない。お前はタッセーラの歴史に刻まれた汚点だ。今こそ…」{n}あなたは武器を構え、ソロモーンの言葉が終わると同時に総督を処刑した。{/n}「…それを拭い去る時だ」
languages.original_text: "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time—" {n}You point your weapon and put the governor to death right as Solomorne finishes speaking:{/n} "—to wipe you from it."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルド、お前は思いもよらぬ異端を犯した。俺はお前を人間とも、犯罪者として裁かれるべき存在とも認めない。お前はタッセーラの歴史に刻まれた汚点だ。今こそ…」{n}あなたは武器を構え、ソロモーンの言葉が終わると同時に総督を処刑した。{/n}「…それを拭い去る時だ」
